def_cn: (与名词、形容词连用构成形容词)表示“…风格的”，“有…特征的”
def_en: -style combines with nouns and adjectives to form adjectives which describe the style or characteristics of something.

def_cn: (与名词、形容词连用构成副词)表示“以…方式”
def_en: -style combines with adjectives and nouns to form adverbs which describe how something is done.
